title: Voice recognition not working from lock screen
content:
Trying to add items to shopping list using voice controls. Assistant just says "I can help with that" then I'm presented with the following screen. This is at home, using smart unlock (which hardly ever works). Quite often does this when setting reminders using the same approach. Any idea why this suddenly started doing this? 

Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
